card.name: CW - CCW243 - Inoxico UAT Web Service issue

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

I have made contact with Addworks from Inoxico. I have briefed Addworks about what information i all need from him to perform an investigation.

I have also noted to him that if i cannot gather any information then we would need to perform a check via telephone.

i am awaiting his reply.
